exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = /^\d{4,}-[01]\d-[0-3]\dT[0-2]\d:[0-5]\d:[0-5]\d.\d+(?:[+-][0-2]\d:[0-5]\d|Z)$/.test(article.createdAt);

tests['Article.description remained the same'] = article.description === 'A fascinating story of the most unusual person';
